meanings.sent1: The wrecking ball demolishes the old building.
meanings.sent2: The hurricane demolishes houses along the coast.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy demolishes a pillow during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her powerful voice demolishes any doubts about her talent.
meanings.sent5: The unstoppable force of nature demolishes everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: The champion boxer demolishes his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The student demolishes the final exam with ease.
meanings.sent3: The team demolishes the competition, securing their victory.
meanings.sent4: His argument demolishes any counterpoints raised by his peers.
meanings.sent5: The skilled chess player demolishes his rival in just a few moves.
